segments.text: Have you seen the new Hannibal Letter movie ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . What did you think of it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I thought it was better than the others-I really liked it.What did you think of it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I liked it , too . It was scary , but not disgusting . I always enjoy watching Anthony Hopkins . He's brilliant .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Mmm . That's what I thought , too . And I always enjoy watching Anthony Hopkins .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , yes , he is brilliant . What's the name of the young actor ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hum , Edward Norton , or something like that .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . He was excellent . They worked well together .
segments.speaker: S1
